website_summaries.verdict: Though costly, it's worth considering for anyone who is looking for a rich formula for the area around the eyes, as it has been reported by customers to be effective at reducing wrinkles that develop there.
pros: A pro-retinol formula by Olay, a name that's synonymous with youthful skin
Lightweight formula is designed specifically for the delicate skin around the eyes
Tube has an applicator tip to prevent pulling at the skin
cons: Expensive, plus the tube is small – contains just 15 ml

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS EYE SERUM
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I’ve used a lot of different eye serums/creams and nothing worked. I was told by my eye doctor that I would need to eventually have eyelid surgery to remove some of the drooping eyelid. It is hereditary, my mom had to have the surgery. So my doctor made a note in my record. I found this product and immediately starting using it. I saw the doctor for my annual exam and he was obviously confused to see the notation in my record that he had made about the eyelid surgery. He comment that he saw no indiction thAt I would need the surgery and removed it from my record.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline A. Borte

customer_reviews.title: Beware of this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product from Amazon and immediately experienced burning sensation and sustained a long burn mark under one eye, even though I immediately removed the eye cream with cold water. I am still treating this burn mark which is now scaly. I have used olay products, including this one, for years and have never had a problem, which leads me to believe that this was probably a fake product. I also contacted olay directly and they confirmed that the formula had not been changed. Olay requested that I keep this product so I can send it to them for investigation.
customer_reviews.author: Janet E. Lorek

customer_reviews.title: Caused irritation
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for 2 months now. I’m almost 40 with fine lines under my eyes. Initially, when I used this I felt a slight stinging sensation and I thought that would go away with continued use as my skin gets used to it. Nope, 8 weeks later, it actually burns worse and has led to these raised bumps of irritated skin around my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetpsmama

customer_reviews.title: Useless!
customer_reviews.text: Should have known better... none of these seem to work to depuff eyes... I thought with a name brand it might work, but don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Starlight

customer_reviews.title: This actually works.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using for two weeks and my crows feet and lines under my eyes are less. I’m surprised. Most stuff doesn’t work, this does. And I’m 66 and practically live outside.
customer_reviews.author: scf

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective and happy
customer_reviews.text: Read about this line in a magazine. Sometimes I buy drugstore brands and sometimes I splurge at Sephora. I think this one was as good as some of my more pricey purchases. Good for all over eye use -- as my main issue is keeping crows feet at bay and relieving crepey lids.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Visible Difference!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Olay product lines and have used them for years. This is my first "Olay de-puff eye roller" purchase as I've used others from various lines. I must say that I am impressed with Olay's results. I'm 70 [w/ sensitive skin] and don't have a lot of lines around my under eye area but I do have the typical bagginess that comes with age plus occasional puffiness that comes with lack of sleep. Although there is no topical cream/serum etc that can truly take the age bags away [and I've done some serious research] this product did preform a miracle on my puffiness and definitely smoothed what lines I do have! Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in this product. Im an avid Olay product user and have been for a while now and this product hasnt done anything for me and its been a little over a month of strict, twice a day, use now. The only thing it does is make my under eyes look shiny from the glitter specks in it. The search continues on for a good under eye cream
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works
customer_reviews.text: About a year ago I developed under eye bags from stress, malnutrition and just my general lifestyle. I bought all kinds of crap that did nothing and then finally decided to try my mom's old favorite line of products, Olay. This stuff had my bags gone in under two weeks. I was very impressed. I still have the same tube from a year ago. It doesn't take much product at all so it lasts a long, long time. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: ERed

customer_reviews.title: I have always loved and trusted Olay products
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved and trusted Olay products, and this eye serum does not disappoint. Olay, please keep making these products-- I'm 50 years old now, and I count on you! =-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The uTubers gave this eye cream top reviews saying results ...
customer_reviews.text: The uTubers gave this eye cream top reviews saying results were seen within 2 weeks. I am 2 weeks into using this product and I see no difference. I am not asking for miracles but a little tightness for a few minutes would be exciting.
customer_reviews.author: Sommers Dian

customer_reviews.title: I have used it for quite some time and like how it feels and what it does
customer_reviews.text: This is my "go to" eye cream. I have used it for quite some time and like how it feels and what it does. Glad to see I could get it from Amazon at a much reduced price from other places.
customer_reviews.author: NMC

customer_reviews.title: I love Olay, but this does not deliver
customer_reviews.text: I use everything Olay. I love their body wash and their body soap. It's all we buy! I was very disappointed that this product didn't deliver. I use it everyday, twice a day, and I have not seen any results in my under eye bags fading away. The product is soft and silky, but I wouldn't buy again just because I have not had results.... my search will continue for the perfect eye serum.
customer_reviews.author: Kdawg

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is a miracle in a tube!! ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a miracle in a tube!!! It really works. Don’t give up. It takes a few weeks, but so worth it. My lines by my eyes are gone! I don’t get the under eye bag part.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I got this after seeing its 5 star rating on beautypedia. I was looking for an eye cream that wouldn’t clog my pores, but which would add a little more hydration and extra nutrients I’ve and above my regular moisturizer. This has worked beautifully for me, it has definitely helped soften my eye area without making it sticky or oily.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: this really works. stops upper lids from sagging. love this product
customer_reviews.author: Richard Shinta

customer_reviews.title: Yellow not white, may have expired.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Olay Eyes for many years and I do love it but this tube was not a white cream as they have always been but was yellow. The packaging was a little different, too. I did call Olay manufacturing and they said it was most likely a faulty batch or old. They were kind enough to send me a coupon for a new tube. The product itself is great, just check the expiration on the box. I'm hoping this was not a counterfeit product sold through Amazon. I will purchase it again but only through CVS or Walgreens.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Temporary solution
customer_reviews.text: Used the product as recommended, twice a day, should be a noticeable difference in that time. It diminished the bags under my eyes, but only continued use for an additional two weeks they were gone. But when you run out or stop using bags retuned with in a week
customer_reviews.author: Monica Mazet

customer_reviews.title: Excessive dryness
customer_reviews.text: I don’t see how this has so many good reviews. I did my reset before purchasing and still wound up with a dud. Somethings work for people and others don’t, this was one that didn’t work for me. It arrived on time like almost everything that comes from Amazon does but after washing my face and applying this it dried my eyelids out. It was flakey and coarse feeling. I have never experienced this type of dryness before. I was tryin to find something less pricey, but it looks like I’ll just stick with the banana bright cream on Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my eye lids and around the bottom of my eye and corner. Works like a charm to get rid of wrinkles. And extra skin that sometimes comes down on my eyelid. Would recommend this to anyone! Will buy again! Olay is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl    Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: After a few minutes it felt like my eye bags were ON FIRE
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product. I put it under my eyes after washing my face. After a few minutes it felt like my eye bags were ON FIRE. Like the surface of the sun. I washed my face again, but, I had red burn marks under my eyes for a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: AnnH

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a tube.
customer_reviews.text: Miracle in a tube. A few summers ago, my mom became critically ill and spent several weeks in hospital. I cried so much, I looked like hell. Even after lots of water and sleep, I realized I’d given myself a wrinkle under one eye - a fold / crease / bag that just wouldn’t go away. Tried this in a fit of desperation - and look at that - the crease is much shorter, less deep, and less noticeable. I am hopeful that continues use will see continued improvement! Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Karyn

customer_reviews.title: It feels good to use but does not work
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable to use, but after using it a few times, it does not improve my dark circles and fine lines under my eyes. Therefore, it has no substantive effect.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Most important eye skin care item!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this stuff is magic! I wake up with major puffiness under my eyes... after I put my other creams on I roll just a little under each eye (make sure to get it spread evenly from bottom of eyelid to everywhere the puffiness is) then I switch to getting my hair fixed and by the time I’m done with my hair (about 10 minutes) the puffiness is almost gone and only continues to improve over the next 30-45 minutes. I finished my makeup right after my hair and I don’t even have to worry about the puffiness because I know that is already almost gone and the rest will be gone soon!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great for swollen eye lids
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! This gel is so good for puffy eyes. I was given this after my husband passed away, so my eyes were horribly swollen from crying. More than just for appearances, it took down the swelling so I could even just see out of my swollen lids. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JDDPTA

customer_reviews.title: the packaging is ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: The earlier version of this product in the white tube came in a small, simple, adequate cardboard box; this red tube came in packaging that is five times larger than it needs to be, made of layers of cardboard and stiff plastic. Olay needs to adopt the value of simple packaging and minimizing trash or this customer will buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: April D. Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Empty or non functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and didn't open package until previous one ran out. The new one was empty or just couldn't get any solution to come through. The last 3 units I bought via retail, perhaps here it's not the real product? Will have to buy through retail where supply chain can be trusted
customer_reviews.author: hfbrof

customer_reviews.title: very strong
customer_reviews.text: this product is so strong it makes my eyes water
customer_reviews.author: ann's opinon

customer_reviews.title: Wow- it seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: Am surprised to say that it works- I thought I was just mollifying myself by indulging my hopes that my fine lines around my eyes would dissipate. But when friends & family notice, complement you on your appearance, & ask you about it.....and you'd not mentioned use of such products to any one.....well, ok, then!
customer_reviews.author: K2ofCU

customer_reviews.title: Love that it makes my eyes smoother and the skin more  relaxed.
customer_reviews.text: I like it isn't greasy. It is light and my eyes look more relaxed. At 78, that is a good thing. My daughter asked what I was doing different. My friends have also noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Jane B. Nolen

customer_reviews.title: This product does. It work!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! If I saved the box I would return it ASAP. I should have read reviews! What a waste of money! Amazon should not sell it since it doesn’t work! For a well known company, an international company like Olay to sell a tube of “snake oil” like this is a shame. Snake oil used to be sold to cure everything for those of you too young to be familiar with the phrase.
customer_reviews.author: IluvBen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Olay products have a well-earned reputation. This provides moisture and UV protection around the eyes and that by itself makes the eyes look better. There are no miracles to prevent aging, but that is no reason not to protect what you have.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: My only go to eye serum
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for almost 10 years, I really don’t have much wrinkle around my eyes. Amazing product, my only go to eye serum
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: It burns.
customer_reviews.text: Not much of a difference my eyes continue to have the safe puffiness. Also, when I apply it, the area starts to burn and if I rub it with anything (to remove makeup) my skin feels pain and it has become very sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Seem To Work
customer_reviews.text: This is at best, a good moisturizer, but it didn’t do ANYTHING for my wrinkles and fine lines. Therefore it’s definitely overpriced and you can get a moisturizer for far less.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Olay - Wonderful discovery & decent price!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful product. I have been using it for a few months and am planning to do so in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Zoivick

customer_reviews.title: Item is ok
customer_reviews.text: Item is ok. I like the roller part of the pen to massage the eye bags but honestly didnt see a major difference.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: i like this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: i like this product a lot...it helped under the eyes and above my eyes...only problem i had is during the hot summer it would get in my eyes and start burning them
customer_reviews.author: cindy romanick

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expensive eye creams.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite. Tried all the expensive eye creams. This works best, instantly. I have extremely sensitive, skin and this does not irritate my skin, or irritate my contact lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to really work.
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easily and really seems to help puffiness. The wands run out fairly quickly which is a drawback. Still worth it since so many of this type of product don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Meemaw

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this product and I think it makes a difference in the skin around my eyes. Dark circles and puffiness are reduced and it is quickly absorbed. I will continue to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Squiggy

customer_reviews.title: So cool on the eyes and it actually works!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little hesitant about purchasing this product. But it really worked wonders on my eyes. The price was great and the quality of it is very good as well. So I am a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Kara McKee Hall

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it
customer_reviews.text: My mother has been using this for a long time now and although I'm open to sending her any skincare on Amazon, she always asked for this and the rest of the series.
customer_reviews.author: K433Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do anything for me
customer_reviews.text: This hasn’t done anything for my eyes. I haven’t seen a difference and I would and still apply it every night. No lift or anything. Idk if it’s me or the product, but I feel like my crows feet got bigger too. For the price and brand, I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Khamsiri

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre eye treatment
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well. Has to be primed and pumped to work well. Then it does work OK. But nothing dramatic. Not irritating but not very strong
customer_reviews.author: Roger X

customer_reviews.title: Light, not greasy,  very effective.
customer_reviews.text: Just started using the product. I'm 68 & helps soften my crows feet & bagging under my eyes. Very sheer & a great moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Servoss Isaacson

customer_reviews.title: Okay Eye Lift Serum Works !
customer_reviews.text: I like this item very much. This is my second tube. It helps clear redness, puffiness and bags. I have lots of allergies and this helps clear up this too.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Zell

customer_reviews.title: Does as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Good moderately priced Eye Serum. Does control and lessen tiny lines and wrinkles well. Does not feel greasy, and I do not need to use much of it, just a tiny dab.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne

customer_reviews.title: I have tried other products in the past that made my eyes feel better.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product daily for about a month. Couldn’t see a noticeable difference. I have tried other products in the past that made my eyes feel better.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for this eye cream. Seemed very thin and did not sink into skin.
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: It keeps my eyes looking younger.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Olay Eye lifting Serum for years. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Minor

customer_reviews.title: Mary’s revuew
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and my first time to use it. This product for me is very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Marivick S. Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Did not remove puffiness
customer_reviews.text: Like the texture, just didn't meet my puffy eye needs.
customer_reviews.author: kutkut

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning and within a short period it has absorbed and reduced my under eye bags. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I use it every morning and nite and I see the difference each time I use this product. I am now on the "auto refill" system as I not only get a discount but I never run out.
customer_reviews.author: R. CAIN

customer_reviews.title: Affordable eye cream
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mom for xmas. She will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lorenzana

customer_reviews.title: Defective...dried out.
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering this item from Amazon. Didn’t open it until 4-20-19 and it was completely dried out. I clicked per instructions over 20 times and nothing! Because I ordered end of February it was past return window. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jacenko

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works for me, when so many other products have not. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl L. Lizarraga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works on this old face I can see the difference
customer_reviews.author: Margielou Peters

customer_reviews.title: Good product and service
customer_reviews.text: I dislike having to write these. I think the star rating system is more than sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Duke

customer_reviews.title: If it’s Olay it works
customer_reviews.text: I love how it feels & absorbs if it’s Olay it works
customer_reviews.author: Beth Bennet-Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work at all. I tried it several days on just one eye. No change whatsoever! Waste of $$$$$$$ Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We will see if this works
customer_reviews.text: So far I haven't seen any difference in my eye bags but I have only been using it for a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Would Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love it. Have been using for a bit under two weeks. You don't need a lot and it feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Judie S

customer_reviews.title: Soothing.
customer_reviews.text: First time user of this product. It's wonderful. Eye area was suffering from winter dryness. Upon first application, felt soothing relief. And, after just 2-days use, the dryness disappeared. Will definitely continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE  L  LYNK

customer_reviews.title: Moisture
customer_reviews.text: This serum really adds moisture to the eye area. Been using since last week.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Thalheimer

customer_reviews.title: The product works as advertised. I'm happy I got it.
customer_reviews.text: It's gentle on the eyelid & under eye puffiness is less.
customer_reviews.author: Nannette

customer_reviews.title: Not working?
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting for any results after a couple weeks of use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: I tried the product several times on my eyeballs and no change at all occurred.
customer_reviews.author: Camilo A. Santos

customer_reviews.title: It's very good
customer_reviews.text: It's very good, have been use Olay brand for the last 30 years now.
customer_reviews.author: phoenix988

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this for 3 weeks and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 3 weeks and I see an improvement in the lines around my eyes. Too soon to tell if it will last, but I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Dale L Van Ness

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: OK, but not great, Need something more creamy for winter.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Great puffy eye relief
customer_reviews.text: My Holiday eyes (puffy from lack of sleep) are loving this little gem♡
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Safe Even For Eyelids.
customer_reviews.text: I was Amazed as this really reversed my 60 something year old eyelid crepeiness. Softened crows feet too.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlettsmimi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does not appear to do as good a job as older versions of this product.
customer_reviews.author: harju

customer_reviews.title: Olay name brand reliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for my mom. I use same product purchased at CVS. Takes 2 weeks to tell if it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lugar

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and feels good but produces no change.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Great hydration and another good affordable eye serum/cream by Olay
customer_reviews.text: I love the moisture that this serum provides. I do not see any lifting properties on myself, but it does keep the eye area hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love. Helps my eyes and skin around to look fresh and awake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have to have!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite beauty products! I can tell how good it works when I run out and don’t have it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Luke this eye cream. Does not irritate skin or eyes. Have not seen results yet only been using for a week. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Olay Eye Lifting Gel
customer_reviews.text: Not the best I've used, but for the price, it works :-)
customer_reviews.author: 2Puggles

customer_reviews.title: Burns
customer_reviews.text: I used this for about a week. One morning I awoke to my under eye very swollen and burning. After the swelling went down I was left with actual burn tissue under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Lumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Fake product - not an Oil of Olay brand product
customer_reviews.text: Fake product. Lacks the standard Oil of Olay brand copyright symbol, includes the words USA after the address (genuine Oil of Olay products do not), and is a different color red tube than the genuine product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: florida

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I noticed a difference right away. I highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: B. Goode

customer_reviews.title: I love it, I actually use it all over my face
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I actually use it all over my face
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Anne Mays

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Maybe will not depute your eyes completely but IT WILL HELP A LOT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jones Family

customer_reviews.title: worth trying
customer_reviews.text: Olay products are excellent... time will tell if this helps with my under-eye circles
customer_reviews.author: AS1225

customer_reviews.title: This serum did not work for me. It burned.
customer_reviews.text: I was unhappy with this eye serum it burned and stung my eye areas. I had to quite using it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Patten

customer_reviews.title: So far, no competition
customer_reviews.text: Always use it. Sometimes try to change but I have no competition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders! I could see a difference in one use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this... in minutes my bags under my eyes are gone!
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan jones

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell if it really works. Disappointed. I don't think the roller balls do anything ... ?
customer_reviews.author: Ceg

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this from the time I purchase it and saw little change.
customer_reviews.author: KAH

customer_reviews.title: Looking young at any age
customer_reviews.text: Have use Olay products for the face for many years. Have tried others but always come back to Olay and now the new Retinol 24 are great and make me look good. I'm 64 years young.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: sorry this product I could see no difference wast of money for me
customer_reviews.author: robertcault

customer_reviews.title: Truly like the results
customer_reviews.text: Have used Olay Eyes for a couple of years. Truly like the results.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie J Evans Coontz

customer_reviews.title: Definitely try with caution
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. I applied this to the corner of my eyes and under eyes as a preventive treatment to help slow signs of aging. Unfortunately it actually made my skin have a really weird texture and start peeling. It actually aged my look for a couple of weeks while my skin recovered from using this product. I don't have particularly sensitive skin but this product just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and time my first product from olay that doesn't measure up
customer_reviews.text: Does not work but if you like put it on your eyes so they can water
customer_reviews.author: Les Lopez

product_meta.title: Olay Eyes Pro Retinol Eye Cream Anti-Wrinkle Treatment for Crow's Feet, 0.5 fl oz
product_meta.description: Style Name:Retinol TreatmentOlay’s best wrinkle-fighting ingredient is now in an eye cream, Olay Eyes Pro Retinol Eye Cream for crow's feet. It fights crow’s feet and smoothes skin to reduce the look of your deepest wrinkles in just 4 weeks. The eye treatment’s potent formula, with Pro-Retinol, helps increase the rate of surface cell turnover to smooth the look of wrinkles. And, with strong hydrating properties, it helps fortify skin’s natural moisture barrier allowing your skin to better retain moisture. Dermatologically tested, watch your crow’s feet take flight with the Pro Retinol Eye Treatment.
feature_bullets: Pro Retinol Eye Cream Treatment reduces the look of your crow's feet in just 4 weeks
